description: inserts values into ds, then delete it. check with get_var before and after

processingCommand.script:
!:data source variable name
:SET &DATASOURCE = "AE_TEST_DPG_2"
!:------------------
!:sets 1st column
:PUT_VAR &DATASOURCE, UppER, UPPERvalue1
:PUT_VAR &DATASOURCE, loWer, lowerVALUE1
!:------------------
!:set ther rest
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, UPPER, 2, UPPERvalue2
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, LOWER, 2, lowerVALUE2
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, UPpER, 3, UPPERvalue3
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, LoWer, 3, lowerVALUE3
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, UpPER, 4, UPPERvalue4
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, loWeR, 4, lowerVALUE4
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, upper, 5, UPPERvalue5
:PUT_VAR_COL &DATASOURCE, lower, 5, lowerVALUE5
!:------------------
!:check if correct value is there
:SET &VAR1A = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "UPPER", 1)
:PRINT &VAR1A 
:PUB &VAR1A
:SET &VAR1B = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "lower", 1)
:PRINT &VAR1B 
:PUB &VAR1B
:SET &VAR2A = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "UPPER", 2)
:PRINT &VAR2A 
:PUB &VAR2A
:SET &VAR2B = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "lower", 2)
:PRINT &VAR2B 
:PUB &VAR2B
:SET &VAR3A = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "UPPER", 3)
:PRINT &VAR3A 
:PUB &VAR3A
:SET &VAR3B = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "lower", 3)
:PRINT &VAR3B 
:PUB &VAR3B
:SET &VAR4A = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "UPPER", 4)
:PRINT &VAR4A 
:PUB &VAR4A
:SET &VAR4B = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "lower", 4)
:PRINT &VAR4B 
:PUB &VAR4B
:SET &VAR5A = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "UPPER", 5)
:PRINT &VAR5A 
:PUB &VAR5A
:SET &VAR5B = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "lower", 5)
:PUB  &VAR5B 
:PRINT &VAR5B 
:IF  &VAR1A <> "UPPERvalue1"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 1a"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR1B <> "lowerVALUE1"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 1b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR2A <> "UPPERvalue2"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 2a"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR2B <> "lowerVALUE2"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 2b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR3A <> "UPPERvalue3"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 3a"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR3B <> "lowerVALUE3"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 3b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR4A <> "UPPERvalue4"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 4a"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR4B <> "lowerVALUE4"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 4b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR5A <> "UPPERvalue5"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 5a"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VAR5B <> "lowerVALUE5"
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Values do not match 5b"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Everythink is OK, value matches"
:ENDIF

:DELETE_VAR  &DATASOURCE,UPPER
:DELETE_VAR  &DATASOURCE,lower

:SET &VARX = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "UPPER", 1)
:PRINT &VARX 
:SET &VARY = GET_VAR( &DATASOURCE, "lower", 1)
:PRINT &VARY 
!:------------------------
!:now should be empty
:IF  &VARX <> ""
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Value is no empty (X)"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Check is OK"
:ENDIF
:IF  &VARY <> ""
:   STOP MSG, 14, "Value is no empty (Y)"
:ELSE
:   PRINT "Check is OK"
:ENDIF
